#####Using VCFtools program

###The following is an example of implementing the VCFtools program to generate information about read depth, site depth and mean site depth of coverage for SNP data generated by ddRADseq and processed through the Stacks pipeline...


module load vcftools/0.1.14-xp36ajy


vcftools --vcf ./jmahguib/UStacks_outputs/WM_TGCP/batch_1.vcf --site-mean-depth --out ./jmahguib/VCF_Tools_outputs/TGCP_Pop-r85


vcftools --vcf ./jmahguib/UStacks_outputs/WM_TGCP/batch_1.vcf --site-depth --out ./jmahguib/VCF_Tools_outputs/TGCP_Pop-r85


vcftools --vcf ./jmahguib/UStacks_outputs/WM_TGCP/batch_1.vcf --depth --out ./jmahguib/VCF_Tools_outputs/TGCP_Pop-r85
